div.ab:
One ought not to keep it in
water
when
tempered
ground
with
oil
for it loses its color. It is better to choose whitish
vermilion
than dark & blackish. For
vermilion
is commonly mixed with a little
lake
, without which it would hardly be different from
minium
. But the pale casts more vivacity than the dark. It is not desiccative, & for this reason one mixes in
calcined
cristallin
.
